title: Spectral flow of the Dirac spectrum in intersecting vortices
abstract: The spectrum of the Dirac Hamiltonian in the background of crossing vortices is studied. To exploit the index theorem, and in analogy to the lattice the space-time manifold is chosen to be the four-torus T^4. For sake of simplicity we consider two idealized cases: infinitely fat and infinitely thin transversally intersecting vortices. The time-dependent spectrum of the Dirac Hamiltonian is calculated and in particular the influence of the vortex crossing on the quark spectrum is investigated.
